1456160.name: Disc Room Soundtrack
1456160.description: DISC ROOM (Original SoundTrack) is 53 tracks of death bent Sci-Fi synth melodies and blistering bass heavy beats from the indie VideoGame DISC ROOM. Enjoy 2 hours of anthemic adrenaline inducing slappers, packed with break neck drums and sinister SpaceWave melodies. You too, can feel the presence of blood curdling saw blades surrounding you in the privacy of your own home with the DISC ROOM (Original SoundTrack)!
